mapper.select: select * from qna join space on qna.space_no=space.space_no where space.member_email=#{hostId}

select rownum, Q.* from( select * from qna join space on qna.space_no=space.space_no where space.member_email='sinsa@naver.com' and qna_answer is null order by qna_date desc ) Q where rownum between 1 and 50
select space.space_no, space_name, settlement_date, daily_total_hour, daily_revenue from daily_sale join space on daily_sale.space_no=space.space_no where member_email=#{hostId}
